name: (The Legend of) The Candy Crusader
description:
For the UoB CSS Halloween 2021 Game Jam. All assets created in house -- always fresh, never frozen.

...

You wake up on a cold Halloween's Eve in 1991 with determination in your young mind. You have decreed you will be the Candy Crusader, master of the neighborhoods.

In order to collect all the candy, you must fight through buildings upon buildings to collect it all before Halloween ends. You calculated 10 seconds is the maximum time you have at each house, so you must be quick.

...

Movement - WASD

Attack - LMB / Space

Inventory* - E

*Inventory can only be accessed between levels.
